com.gej.input

Class GMouse

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.gej.input.GMouse

  • public class GMouse
extends java.lang.Object
    This class can be used to note mouse input from any class in the game which are automatically updated by the GInput.
    Author:
    Sri Harsha Chilakapati
